mean_cn: v. 解释，释义；  n. 转述，释义
mean_en: to express what somebody has said or written using different words, especially in order to make it easier to understand
sentence: To paraphrase the famous saying, success comes from failure.
sentence_trans: 这句名言的意思是说，成功源于失败。
word_etyma: para半、类似 + phrase说，短语 → 类似的说法 → n.释义；改述；演释曲
